verbs.description: [ARG0: Donald Trump] [V: told] [ARG2: reporters] [ARG1: that Melania could n’t make it to the G7 Summit because she had a “ big operation , ” in reference to her kidney procedure] .
Donald Trump told reporters that Melania [V: could] n’t make it to the G7 Summit because she had a “ big operation , ” in reference to her kidney procedure .

Donald Trump told reporters that [ARG0: Melania] [ARGM-MOD: could] [ARGM-NEG: n’t] [V: make] it [ARG1: to the G7 Summit] [ARGM-CAU: because she had a “ big operation , ” in reference to her kidney procedure] .
Donald Trump told reporters that Melania could n’t make it to the G7 Summit because [ARG0: she] [V: had] [ARG1: a “ big operation] , ” [ARGM-ADV: in reference to her kidney procedure] .
